methods.name: public Builder setMenuPresentation(@NonNull RemoteViews value)
methods.comment:
* The presentation used to visualize this field in fill UI. * *

Theme does not work with RemoteViews layout. Avoid hardcoded text color * or background color: Autofill on different platforms may have different themes.

methods.name: public Builder setInlinePresentation(@NonNull InlinePresentation value)
methods.comment:
* The {@link InlinePresentation} used to visualize this dataset as inline suggestions.
         * If the dataset supports inline suggestions, this should not be null.

methods.name: public Builder setDialogPresentation(@NonNull RemoteViews value)
methods.comment:
* The presentation used to visualize this field in the fill dialog UI. * *

Theme does not work with RemoteViews layout. Avoid hardcoded text color * or background color: Autofill on different platforms may have different themes.

methods.name: public Builder setInlineTooltipPresentation(@NonNull InlinePresentation value)
methods.comment:
* The {@link InlinePresentation} used to show the tooltip for the
         * {@code mInlinePresentation}. If the set this field, the
         * {@code mInlinePresentation} should not be null.

methods.name: public Presentations build()
methods.comment: Builds the instance. This builder should not be touched after calling this!
